Author: Reb Klimrod
Title: [ANN]PokerSports Launches ICO ($XPST)
Body: Great project, good luck to the developers in the implementation of plans! The project is already trading on the exchanges Idex and bitpaction, but do you plan to enter the larger exchanges in the near future?

Author: mycryptoverse
Title: [ANN]PokerSports Launches ICO ($XPST)
Body: Yes, we already had the option to join HitBTC. However, the listing cost of $40K USD did not seem worth the cost at this current time. We are but a startup with limited funding. We felt the budget would be better suited to pay for the development of our platform pokersports.com and the CFS league launching in a few short months!  Thank you for being a part of the community and supporting us! We will branch out to other exchanges when the timing is better suited!  Cheers!

Author: PokerSports
Title: [ANN]PokerSports Launches ICO ($XPST)
Body: PokerSports, a company looking to revolutionize the way fantasy sports are played through the integration of blockchain, iGaming and eSports, announced today the launch of their Initial Coin Offering for the PokerSports Token (XPST).  PokerSportsâ€™ main focus is to revolutionize the fantasy sports industry through the creation of dozens of card-based games; one of which, FantasyStud (a fantasy sports game based on seven-card stud poker), was released in July of 2017 in anticipation of Week 1 of the NFL season. In the end, PokerSports wants to be considered the casino of fantasy sports.  The creation of the PokerSports Token, one of the first gaming tokens based on the Ethereum blockchain, will not only help expedite the process of bringing the companyâ€™s vision to life, but it will also help address many of the issues and drawbacks that the industry is currently facing, with its nearly 60 million users.  â€œThe PokerSports Token allows for us to not only take the next step in turning the fantasy sports industry on its head, but it allows for us to create a personal connection with all of our users,â€ CEO Kyler Tolefree said. â€œFor them, itâ€™s going to be more than just an investment in the growth of the company.â€  After purchasing PokerSports Tokens, users will have access to a decentralized digital currency that they can use to play all of PokerSportsâ€™ games and access exclusive information only available through PokerSports. By using this unique token rather than U.S dollars, users from around the world will have access to PokerSportsâ€™ revolutionary platform and be able to take part in competitive fantasy sports gaming under a trustless system.  That system removes any chance of a user having holds on funds or being hit with unexpected fees. It also allows PokerSports users to have full control over their digital assets and gives them the freedom to transfer PokerSports Tokens to wallets outside of the platform. On top of that, if a user is no longer interested in playing PokerSports games, he or she will have the ability to trade them for other cryptocurrencies.  In the end, the token sale will help PokerSports take its first steps in revolutionizing the way we play fantasy sports. The funds raised will primarily be used to market FantasyStud, create The Competitive Fantasy Sports (CFS) eSports League and fund the development of upcoming games. PokerSports plans on having four different card-based games released across seven professional sports by the end of 2019.  For more information on the ICO: www.PokerSports.io Or review our white paper: https://www.pokersports.io/whitepaper/pokersports-whitepaper.pdf#zoom=30

Author: PokerSports
Title: [ANN]PokerSports Launches ICO ($XPST)
Body: We would also like to announce we will now be accepting Bitcoin (BTC) and Litecoin (LTC) as payment options to buy $XPST during the ICO! We have created an official announcement via our Medium page and the new option should be available very soon!  Here is a link to the announcement: https://medium.com/@pokersports/pokersports-ico-introduces-bitcoin-and-litecoin-as-payment-options-8b04e8fe779c  Users will also be able to purchase with any Ethereum wallet. They no longer have to use an ERC-20 wallet for them to be able to receive their tokens!!  Lastly, we ask that you fill out the weekly bounty forms so that you can receive your earned bounties for the week!  www.pokersports.io

Author: mycryptoverse
Title: [ANN]PokerSports Launches ICO ($XPST)
Body: I just mentioned this on the official [ANN] thread featuring our bounty program:  I just wanted to comment that this is now LIVE and people can buy $XPST with BTC, LTC, and any ETH wallet.  The current dip in the crypto markt has now pushed the token to a $0.025 price point and giving the token a market cap of $12.5million. The DFS market in the US alone is over $7.25 billion!  So, there is an enormous amount of growth for this token. The best time to buy is in a down market during a 50% presale.
